Emolument.origin: [the President shall, at stated times, receive for his services, a compensation…and he shall not receive within that period any other " U.S. Constitution art. II"]

1.1: a return arising from office or employment usually in the form of compensation or perquisites [the President shall, at stated times, receive for his services, a compensation…and he shall not receive within that period any other "
